I'm sorry, but "themostoriginal"....that's hilarious lolololol I'm joining in :D:D:D haha

Don't waste your time downloading this torrent.
The entire tutorial is just a copy/paste of the tutorial from the How To Draw Manga website, that's existed for many, many years (I used to use it over 5 years ago).
http://www.cablenet.ne.jp/~japanime/tutorial/fbodymain.html
Which can be found by going to www.howtodrawmanga.com and clicking "Lessons" at the top, then "Female Figure Drawing".
The uploader could've atleast given credit where it was due.
@ this time, there is 151 seeders, who wants to bet how many of them is of Japanese origin??? ;)

DO NOT download this if you are advanced illustrator. This anatomy sucks even for highschool. 

If you wish to learn to draw anatomy and actually be good at it - then this is not the stuff you would want to practice with.

hmm a quick download... Ty..
